Articles.Content: The lander tweeted "Touchdown! My new address: 67P!"
cheers, cheers

Touchdown!!!!!

Whoooooooooo

Congrats!!!!!!!!!
Philae is on the surface and working well Yahooo!

No, looks like that was just new data. Not quite confirmed.

Landing gear is compressed, so it should be sitting on the surface.
ESA control in Darmsatdt confirms Philae is on 67P.

I'm so happy!

The landing made my day
Horrible french accent guy talking (I can bash, i am french )

You all must be watching a different stream, all I see is a bunch of people stood around talking with no sound.

ok got sound now, and lots of congratulations going on, so I take it it has landed?

no information, no pictures, nothing

anticlimactic to say the least

Horrible french accent guy talking (I can bash, i am french )

Well, at leazt he iz nat talken laik ziz.

It's funny to see so many people speaking different languages and using so many accents.

EDIT: This is the official stream afaik: http://new.livestream.com/esa/cometlanding
the nasa TV livestream works better (and i'm in europe ^^)
French people and the english language really don't mix well.
"Saiiieennncee" In french accent. I think i have new catchprase
Well, that was fun. But now the really cool part is coming. Front row seating for watching the comet light up on its way to its next perhelion
Agreed, it's quite embarrassing that the President of an international space agency is such a poor English-speaker.

Well, at leazt he iz nat talken laik ziz.

It's funny to see so many people speaking different languages and using so many accents.

To me, all the nationalities only add to the project. Even if they sometimes have heavy accents!

French people and the english language really don't mix well.

Besser als der Hesse anschliessend! ;-)))))))

Screw office work, I'm watching this!
Remove the politician. FremdschÃƒÂ¤men intensifies.
On the comet! This can be called one of the most importent space achievements we've had!

Besser als der Hesse anschliessend! ;-)))))))

Screw office work, I'm watching this!

Besser verstehen konnte man ihn auf jeden fall.
Good job and congratulations to all involved.
I disagree. His English is far better than the vast majority of people's French. We can understand him just fine despite his strong accent.

"Saiiieennncee" In french accent. I think i have new catchprase

Very nice-a. I like the German-accented lady just now, "Our nex-schte speaker is..."

Agreed, it's quite embarrassing that the President of an international space agency is such a poor English-speaker.

It is a European project, so French and German are as suitable as English.

I don't understand - people are criticizing other languages and also accents. Why don't you learn the appropriate languages, if that is all such an issue? This project is not about language, it is about monumental (international) scientific progress!
let's talk about the landing, not accents
